subject: Phase 1: Input Schema Extension
description:
Phase 1: Input Schema Extension - COMPLETED

Evidence:
- `workflows/llm_data_collection/old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/input-validator.js:27-38` - Added VALID_MODALITIES and VALID_DIRECTIONS constants:
```javascript
const VALID_MODALITIES = [
  "phone_call",
  "chat",
  "video_meeting",
  "in_person",
  "voice_message",
  "email",
];

const VALID_DIRECTIONS = ["inbound", "outbound", "internal", "multi_party"];
```

- `workflows/llm_data_collection/old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/input-validator.js:85-117` - Added `resolveConversationContext()` function
- `workflows/llm_data_collection/old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/input-validator.js:122-175` - Added `buildRoleMap()` function
- `workflows/llm_data_collection/old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/input-validator.js:180-242` - Added `validateConversationContext()` function
- `workflows/llm_data_collection/CLAUDE.md:150-207` - Added conversation_context documentation with modality/direction tables
- `workflows/llm_data_collection/CLAUDE.md:368-460` - Added 4 example requests (outbound, chat, video meeting, voicemail)
